mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resource (category_id, category_name, uploader_id, title, content, image_path, position) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{categoryName}, #{uploaderId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imagePath}, #{position})
mapper.select: SELECT resource_id, category_id, category_name, uploader_id, title, content, image_path, position, resource.create_time, user.user_name AS uploaderName, user.user_tel AS uploaderTel, user.user_avatar AS uploaderAvatar FROM resource LEFT JOIN user ON resource.uploader_id = user.user_id WHERE uploader_id = #{uploaderId} ORDER BY resource_id DESC
